body: we honestly don’t deserve him🤧❣️

trail.content_raw: we honestly don’t deserve him🤧❣️
trail.content: we honestly don’t deserve him🤧❣️

summary: Okay honestly I really hope you’re like 16 or something like that, because you seem really young and misinterpreting a lot of...
body:
Okay honestly I really hope you’re like 16 or something like that, because you seem really young and misinterpreting a lot of things. So I’m gonna try and break things down and answer as politely as I can. Because this is getting a little bit ridiculous at this point.

☁️ I’m gonna go by each point that you made. First, Imane rejected Sofiane because she was torn about liking a boy that just happened not to be muslim. She didn’t reject him because she’s this evil character that didn’t care about Sofianes feelings. Imane isn’t heartless. She never rejected him in a cold or rude manner. Imane doesn’t owe anything to Sofiane at the end of the day. Not a date. Not a relationship. Not a friendship. But she still offered. It’s why she said they could be friends, if he was okay with it.

☁️ Second, there was definitely a mutual understanding between Sofiane and Imane that they both liked each other and were aware of their feelings. So it can’t be said that Imane didn’t know Sofiane liked her, and it can’t be said that Sofiane didn’t know that she liked him as well. However, she rejected Sofiane because she knew that their relationship wouldn’t work because their values would clash a lot, and Imane wasn’t okay with that at that moment, we don’t know if it’ll change in the future, but in those moments she wasn’t okay with that, hence the rejections. She didn’t reject him because she didn’t have feelings for him, but because of her conflict between her religion and the fact that he isn’t religious. Sofiane knows that’s why, but for him to still reduce that to Imane being over the top or for him to not understand or care about understanding the importance behind her decision just shows that maybe their relationship wouldn’t be that great anyway.

☁️ The scene where Imane snapped at Sofiane was because he had started dating her best friend without talking to her about it, and was pretending that everything was fine and that Imane had no reason to be so short with him, because why wouldn’t she just be a joy around him after seeing him and Manon. His reaction to her attitude was a bit immature, and kind of deserved her snapping. But also it wasn’t even that terrible, so let’s not blow things out of proportion.

☁️ Sofiane was aware Imane liked him, it’s just that she was torn about being with him because of her religion. That doesn’t make her, or his, feelings go away. But it was shady of Sofiane to go and date her best friend, knowing Manon was Imane’s friend, and knowing how awkward it was going to be for the three of them. Especially since he knew there were feelings still there, it’s just that Imane was having trouble acting on them.

☁️ The right thing to have done would’ve been to have talked to Imane about him dating Manon, because of the way things were between them (Sofiane and Imane). So he fucked up because of that. And also about kissing her where he and Imane had their date. But no ones mad at him for actually moving on. Just uneasy because he chose Imane’s best friend and didn’t even talk to her about it. And then acted like everything was cool and that the reason why Imane was being so short with him was this great mystery he couldn’t figure out.

☁️ Regarding her getting him into a fight, Imane didn’t have a hand in that. She was across the road. The only one at fault for the fight is Charles. He was being invasive, and intimidating, towards Manon and he actually pushed Sofiane. So Charles came in already behaving aggressively. It’s not surprising Sofiane punched him. But that choice was Sofiane’s. No one asked him to do that, that was a decision he made. Imane didn’t cause him to get into a fight.

☁️ These are the things that Imane has done wrong: Imane didn’t have to block him and remove him from her life so harshly. But she made a rash decision because she was hurt and conflicted. Shit happens. Imane shouldn’t have emailed Charles, or meddled with Sofianes and Manons relationship period because at the end of the day she rejected Sofiane and even though the person he moved on with wasn’t the best one, that’s still his relationship, and none of her business. Imane fucked up. But Sofiane has fucked up too. They’re teenagers. You don’t think teenagers do the wrong thing sometimes? It happened. And it’ll probably happen again 😂 Because they’re teenagers!

☁️ Imane made the wrong call sometimes, for sure, but so has Sofiane. And what we’re not gonna do is excuse one wrong over the other. Especially when Imane has actually apologized for her wrongdoings. Sofiane hasn’t really brought up the fact that he chose to date Imane’s best friend, specifically, so soon after they technically kind of broke up. He should’ve talked to Imane about it. He knew Imane had feelings for him still. They’re not terrible people, they’re just teenagers, and they’ve both fucked up. But it’s of no use to excuse certain things just because another person fucked up.

☁️ Lastly, If a non muslim person who is religious won’t date someone from another religion apart from their own, that’s just their prerogative. That’s not racist. It’s what Imane is doing, and she’s not being racist towards Sofiane. There are certain ordinances Imane has to do and follow, and same goes for other muslim girls. Not marrying a non muslim guy is one of them. Imane is torn because she loves Sofiane but he’s not Muslim and it would’ve hurt to keep him around while she still has feelings for him so she pushed him away. She went about it the wrong way, we know that, but she’s not being racist by doing this. I’m not seeing the connection you’re making with that.

@evakkkskammm

But that choice was Sofiane’s. No one asked him to do that, that was a decision he made. Imane didn’t cause him to get into a fight.

Shit happens. Imane shouldn’t have emailed Charles, or meddled with Sofianes and Manons relationship period because at the end of the day she rejected Sofiane and even though the person he moved on with wasn’t the best one, that’s still his relationship, and none of her business. Imane fucked up. But Sofiane has fucked up too. They’re teenagers. You don’t think teenagers do the wrong thing sometimes? It happened. And it’ll probably happen again 😂 Because they’re teenagers!

☁️ Imane made the wrong call sometimes, for sure, but so has Sofiane. And what we’re not gonna do is excuse one wrong over the other. Especially when Imane has actually apologized for her wrongdoings. Sofiane hasn’t really brought up the fact that he chose to date Imane’s best friend, specifically, so soon after they technically kind of broke up. He should’ve talked to Imane about it. He knew Imane had feelings for him still. They’re not terrible people, they’re just teenagers, and they’ve both fucked up. But it’s of no use to excuse certain things just because another person fucked up.

☁️ Lastly, If a non muslim person who is religious won’t date someone from another religion apart from their own, that’s just their prerogative. That’s not racist. It’s what Imane is doing, and she’s not being racist towards Sofiane. There are certain ordinances Imane has to do and follow, and same goes for other muslim girls. Not marrying a non muslim guy is one of them. Imane is torn because she loves Sofiane but he’s not Muslim and it would’ve hurt to keep him around while she still has feelings for him so she pushed him away. She went about it the wrong way, we know that, but she’s not being racist by doing this. I’m not seeing the connection you’re making with that.

@evakkkskammm

This is an automatic feed using RSS to post the newest fics from AO3 Lucas/Eliott from Skam France, on your dash.

If not stated otherwise, this is not a rec tumblr. ALT ER LOVE

title: Transit Chronicles
body:
by Sakhmet

Life was different for him. Lucas takes the same route to work everyday, carefully wrapping his world up in routine and restraint. His cautious life is shaken up for the better when he takes a tumble one morning into the lap of a stranger with the kindest eyes.

Words: 2125, Chapters: ½, Language: English

  • Fandoms: SKAM (France)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Eliott Demaury, Lucas Lallemant
  • Relationships: Eliott Demaury/Lucas Lallemant
  • Additional Tags: Hurt/Comfort, Fluff

tags: aajkskdkdldld i can't believe i done this
summary: 1 because they are currently fighting, 26 because I’m a hoe 😂😂😂 jk I just want to see what you say. 💕💞💖❣️💚💗💛💓🧡💝💜❤️
question: 1 because they are currently fighting, 26 because I’m a hoe 😂😂😂 jk I just want to see what you say. 💕💞💖❣️💚💗💛💓🧡💝💜❤️
answer:
ELU Headcanon #26: What their biggest turn ons are.

…

First off, everything that Lucas and Eliott does around each other drives the other up the fucking walls, in a good way.

Of course, there were specific things that made Lucas loose all his brain cells and succumb to Eliott’s every will. Blinded by love and lust you can say. Even in the beginning, when Lucas first saw Eliott, he was starstrucked. His long frame that towered over him. Being already small would usually make Lucas feel annoyed and self conscious about his height but with Eliott? He felt so tiny, and it honestly turned him on a bit. Among other things. After their first kiss in the rain, he was reduced to nothing but an addict starving for more. Those lips that were so sweet against his own. And the lip bitting?? He was gone. The tongue that paved their way in and made him taste heaven. He would always find himself being distracted while looking at them, just waiting for his next kiss. His hair also was something Lucas couldn’t resist pulling in heated moments. And his HANDS? God, Lucas swore he never knew someone’s hands could be so soothing and so strong. Everytime they would hold Lucas up against the wall or brace his own hands above his head as they kissed and fucked was beyond comprehension. There’s was honestly nothing that didn’t turn Lucas on about Eliott. Being a horny teenager was only half the blame when your boyfriend looks like a Greek God.

Eliott on the other hand, play it more subtle. Or so others think. The truth was, he was just as hungry for Lucas. Lucas had a way of making Eliott lose control. His voice for example that was low and intimate, only for him to hear. His abs that were firm and made Eliott lose all sense of focus. His hair; that chaotic spike of a mess whenever they pull apart from their make out sessions. Eliott worshipped everything that was Lucas but the things that gets him going the most was his eyes. They burn sapphires, the type of blue that drowns you in its seas. Especially, when Lucas would look up at him. All coy and innocent like but Eliott knew their true intentions.

It’s a wonder how these two could keep their hands off of each other but they managed to control just enough in public but at home? Well, that’s an entirely different story…

…

(Note: thank you @shipper-of-love for the ask! I don’t know anything about writing smut so 🔥😳🙈 hope you enjoy this!)

title: Transit Chronicles
description:
by Sakhmet

Life was different for him. Lucas takes the same route to work everyday, carefully wrapping his world up in routine and restraint. His cautious life is shaken up for the better when he takes a tumble one morning into the lap of a stranger with the kindest eyes.

blog.name: inthedreamatorium
blog.description:
keri | 33. f | bi. usa | dc.

will today be the day i get over skam?

tags: please don't ask what the rest of my top five are...don't do itttt
summary: You are my goddess i think. But what is your second favourite scene from skam france?
question: You are my goddess i think. But what is your second favourite scene from skam france?
answer:
samedi 9h17 isn’t my favorite scene.

it’s probably top five but it’s not my top two.

my favorite scene is vendredi 19h34. it has a special place in my heart because it was the moment i fell in love with eliott and lucas. i really really loved how we got eliott’s pov in that piano moment. it allowed me to connect to eliott in a way i couldn’t with even.

my second favorite scene?

oh man.

the one that comes straight to mind is samedi 11h07. i love everything about it. from the panic 45 seconds (i timed it!) when lucas thought eliott had left to him realizing eliott was in the kitchen laughing with mika and manon to lucas voicing his concerns and fears regarding lucille (look at that healthy communication! well. look at that healthy communication from lucas!) to that amazing and brilliant kiss, which was my favorite kiss BEFORE we got the rest of it during the “remember” scene.

so yeah.

vendredi 19h34 is my fav. samedi 11h07 is my second fav.
